title: GPT-3 is making even more art obsolete
description: OpenAI is now writing better lyrics and couplets, prompting further discussion about whether artificial intelligence will ever replace raw creativity.

title: Samsung unveils GDDR6 memory with a huge capacity upgrade
description: Samsung preps hardware that is designed to support the virtual future - twice the performance in the same form factor.

title: IT managers think they have the right tech for hybrid working - but workers disagree
description: Canon finds disparity between those in charge of IT and users of it over suitability for hybrid working arrangements.

title: AWS CEO: Embrace cloud and save your dollars…and possibly the world too
description: "If you're looking to tighten your belt, the cloud is the place to do it," says AWS CEO.

title: Gmail could finally be coming to your Android smartwatch
description: Pixel Watch users have so far been left without Gmail and Google Calendar, but that could be about to change.

title: Something fishy’s afoot in Splatoon 3’s upcoming Big Run event
description: Splatoon 3 is gearing up for a three-day co-op marathon, entitled Big Run.

title: Microsoft Defender offers your enterprise a welcome security boost
description: New Microsoft Defender security protections, helping defend firms from ransomware, will be on by default.

title: Starfield may be lonely, but that's exactly what Bethesda wants
description: Todd Howard has spoken about creating Starfield and how loneliness may be the right tone for this space-age game.

title: This top security camera brand might be uploading photos to the cloud without you knowing
description: Eufy claims that its security cameras are GDPR-compliant, but not everyone agrees.

title: Absurd Pokémon Scarlet and Violet bugs: from windmill arms to invisible bikes
description: These Pokémon Scarlet and Violet bugs are no MissingNo, but they still made us laugh.

title: Windows 11 gets a much-awaited fix for gaming bug
description: Were you hit by that nasty Windows 11 stuttering bug? Microsoft has banished it with a new preview patch.

title: Nearly half of all online trackers belong to Google
description: Whether it's Google, Facebook, or Microsoft, some tech giant is tracking you across the web.

title: Amazon Prime members can get an FPS masterpiece for free in December
description: Prime Gaming's free game lineup for December includes Quake and Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons.

title: This new ransomware is seeing rapid growth, so beware
description: Trigona is a new ransomware variant that's been infecting businesses around the world.

title: Proton Calendar finally accessible to everyone worldwide
description: The provider believes Proton Calendar will make a huge difference, especially for those under limited internet freedom.

title: Canon tipped to launch five cameras in 2023, but not the one everyone wants
description: Canon is rumored to be launching five new cameras in 2023, but none of the predicted models are a cheap EOS RP successor.

title: Dropbox is bringing end-to-end encryption for business users
description: Business users are getting more security, courtesy of a new acquisition.

title: I've never heard of these Xbox Games with Gold titles – but they sound amazing
description: Microsoft has revealed its Xbox Games with Gold free games for December 2022 – and they've certainly piqued my interest,

title: Gorilla Glass Victus 2 could save your big phone from disastrous falls on concrete
description: Corning unveils Gorilla Glass Victus 2, new glass that might survive a drop on concrete.

title: Apple M2 Max leaked benchmark gets us excited for MacBook Pros in 2023
description: Apple’s turbocharged new M2 chip looks suitably speedy going by this leaked Geekbench score.

title: Your Google Pixel 7 just got a major security upgrade
description: The Google One VPN is available to Pixel 7 and Pixel 7 Pro smartphone users for free, but it's not as good as ExpressVPN

title: Genshin Impact announces its answer to Hearthstone
description: miHoYo has announced a brand new trading card game mode for Genshin Impact. How will the game compare to the likes of Hearthstone and Magic: Arena?

title: Nvidia celebrates Portal With RTX release by giving away RTX 4090s
description: The Portal with RTX launch party event in December holds some exciting prizes to be won.

title: December's PS Plus Essential lineup has leaked – and it includes this top RPG trilogy
description: Yet again, this month's lineup of PlayStation Plus games has been leaked.

title: Nvidia RTX 4080 GPU hits a huge 3.6GHz overclock – but does anyone care?
description: Even if the RTX 4080 does have some robust overclocking chops, that’s unlikely to help spark sales.

title: Samsung Galaxy S23 could land in early February with an extremely high price
description: A report claims that we'll see the Samsung Galaxy S23 line in the first week of February, but that prices are rising.

title: The Acolyte will turn the Star Wars universe on its head, star teases
description: The upcoming Star Wars Disney Plus show will alter our perceptions of the Sith and Jedi, says one of its stars.

title: Future OnePlus phones will be supported for as long as the Samsung Galaxy S22
description: OnePlus has announced that upcoming phones will get four years of Android updates and five years of security patches.

title: New US trademark filing hints Samsung is working on Self Repair Assistant app
description: Alongside the app, Samsung may be expanding its repair program to include watches and earbuds.
